title: Maps
content:
Maps for Baldur's Gate 3. Maps provide the players with vital information about map navigation, Quests, Items, Weapons, Checkpoints, NPCs, and more.

Maps for Baldur's Gate 3

For in-game areas, please see our Locations page.

Map items in Baldur's gate 3:

Grubby Map Hand-Drawn Map Harper's Map Map of Moonhaven Map of the Shadow-Cursed Lands Map of the Shadowlands Map to Bhaal Temple
